short_summary: Design and delivery of a Gatehouse building for Regional Psychiatric Centre in Saskatoon.
description: The Government of Canada is seeking a professional services contract for the design and delivery of a Gatehouse building for Regional Psychiatric Centre in Saskatoon, Saskatchewan. The contract will be awarded through a competitive bidding process.",
full_summary:
### Solicitation Number: WS4379846731
### Tender Title:
Regional Psychiatric Centre Gatehouse - Saskatoon, Saskatchewan

### Brief Overview
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) requests a proposal from architectural firms to provide services for the design and delivery of a new gatehouse at the Regional Psychiatric Centre in Saskatoon, Saskatchewan.

### Key Background
The Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) requires a new gatehouse to replace the existing undersized entrance building, which no longer meets the facility's needs. The new gatehouse will consolidate several security department functions into one building, while also integrating the existing gatehouse into functionality of the new building with required upgrades.

### Project Scope
The successful bidder will act as Prime Consultant, working in collaboration with a multi-disciplinary team of sub-consultants to deliver the necessary services for this project.

### Tender Details

### Submission Guidelines
*   Submission deadline: March 12, 2024 at 2:00 PM EST
*              Any bids submitted after this time will be declared non-responsive.
*   All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by the above-mentioned deadline.

### Contract Requirements
The PSPC anticipates that the selected bidder will commit to the delivery of services at the following terms:
*   Expected contract start date: May 27, 2024

### Related Agreements
This tender is open to bidders from Canada or any country listed in the World Trade Agreement's Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA).

### Contracting Entity
*   Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   Contact Info:
    *   Name: El Dela Cruz
    *   Email: [el.delacruz@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:el.delacruz@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
